t: Psalm 103
The Forgiving God
Of David.
My*pn soul, bless the Lord,*s and*ln all that is within me, bless his holy name.
My*ln soul, bless the Lord,*s and*ln do not forget all his benefits.
He*pn forgives all your iniquity; he*ln heals all your diseases.
He*ln redeems your life from the Pit; he*ln crowns you with faithful love and compassion.
He*ln satisfies you with good things; your*ln youth is renewed like the eagle.
The*pn Lord*s executes acts of righteousness and*ln justice for all the oppressed.
He*ln revealed his ways to Moses, his*ln deeds to the people of Israel.
The*ln Lord*s is compassionate and gracious, slow*ln to anger and abounding in faithful love.
He*ln will not always accuse us or*ln be angry forever.
He*ln has not dealt with us as our sins deserve or*ln repaid us according to our iniquities.
For*pn as high as the heavens are above the earth, so*ln great is his faithful love toward*ln those who fear him.
As*ln far as the east is from the west, so*ln far has he removed our*ln transgressions from us.
As*ln a father has compassion on his children, so*ln the Lord*s has compassion on those who fear him.
For*ln he knows what we are made of, remembering*ln that we are dust.
As*pn for man, his days are like grass — he*ln blooms like a flower of the field;
when*ln the wind passes over it, it vanishes, and*ln its place is no longer known.
But*ln from eternity to eternity the*ln Lord’s*s faithful love is toward those who fear him, and*ln his righteousness toward the grandchildren
of*ln those who keep his covenant, who*ln remember to observe his precepts.
The*ln Lord*s has established his throne in heaven, and*ln his kingdom rules over all.
Bless*pn the Lord,*s all*ln his angels of great strength, who*ln do his word, obedient*ln to his command.
Bless*ln the Lord,*s all his armies, his*ln servants who do his will.
Bless*ln the Lord,*s all his works in*ln all the places where he rules. My*ln soul, bless the Lord!*s
